FuncDef: The display http-url deny command displays statistics on URLs that match the blacklist.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a webpage address.
The value is a string of 1 to 200 characters.

Indicates that statistics on URLs that match the blacklist are cleared.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If forcible Web authentification or forcible portal operation is performed, after a blacklist is configured, packets that match the blacklist will be discarded to reduce the CPU usage. The display http-url deny command displays statistics on URLs that match the blacklist.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
